channel.title: Comments on: Adding time offsets passed in to a datetime to generate localized datetime
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: This was a response to a question where it cam in as a string, if you had a datetime hoiw would you pass in an offset? you would have to use a different param. But yes would make it much easier
item.content:encoded: This was a response to a question where it cam in as a string, if you had a datetime hoiw would you pass in an offset? you would have to use a different param. But yes would make it much easier
